mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tbl_carmanager WHERE c_carnum = #{carnum} ORDER BY c_sdate DESC, c_stime DESC LIMIT 1

-- CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS : TABLE 이 없을때만 실행 CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS tbl_carmanager ( c_seq BIGINT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, c_carnum VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL, c_qty VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, c_username VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, c_sdate VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, c_stime VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, c_goal VARCHAR(30), c_edate VARCHAR(10), c_etime VARCHAR(10), c_skm INT, c_ekm INT, c_cost INT )
